Package com.foreach.across.test

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAcrossModuleConventionsTest
    Abstract unit test for testing AcrossModule conventions.
    AbstractMockRegistration  
    AcrossTestContext
    This class is a wrapper around a bootstrapped AcrossContext and provides methods for easy querying of said context and its modules.
    AcrossTestContextConfiguration Deprecated
    favour the use of an AcrossTestContextBuilder instead
    AcrossTestWebContext
    Extends the default AcrossTestContext with support for web configurations.
    AcrossTestWebContextConfiguration Deprecated
    MockAcrossServletContext
    Extension of the Spring MockServletContext that also keeps track of all registration actions that have occurred on servlets, filters and listeners.
    MockFilterRegistration
    Mock version of a Dynamic that does nothing but keep a number of configured properties.
    MockFilterRegistration.MappingRule  
    MockJspConfigDescriptor  
    MockServletRegistration
    Mock version of a Dynamic that does nothing but keep a number of configured properties.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AcrossTestConfiguration
    Custom annotation that provides most of the attributes that EnableAcrossContext does, but adds some test-related configurations.
    AcrossTestWebConfiguration Deprecated
    since 1.1.2
    AcrossWebAppConfiguration
    Custom annotation that extends the default org.springframework.test.context.web.WebAppConfiguration with adding an initializer that ensures a MockAcrossServletContext is set on the WebApplicationContext.
